text: Save Me is a Canadian comedy-drama web series, which debuted on the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation's CBC Comedy web platform in 2017."CBC adds new web series on first responders". Media in Canada, April 10, 2017. The series stars Fab Filippo as Goldie, an emergency medical technician who acts as a first responder in a different medical emergency each episode."Telly With Melly: Save Me, Snatch, American Playboy streaming online". canada.com, April 5, 2017. The show's cast also includes Amy Matysio, Suresh John, Loretta Yu, John Bourgeois, Emma Hunter, Lucky Onyekachi Ejim, Brent Carver, Conrad Coates and Dov Tiefenbach."CBC debuts new digital original Save Me". Playback, April 10, 2017. Hunter won the Canadian Screen Award for Best Actress in a Web Program or Series at the 6th Canadian Screen Awards."The Amazing Race Canada and Murdoch Mysteries are repeat Golden Screen Award winners". Toronto Star, March 9, 2018. CBC Television ran the series terrestrially in 2018, following which it received five further Canadian Screen Award nominations in the television categories at the 7th Canadian Screen Awards, for Best Actor in a Drama Program or Limited Series (Filippo), Best Actress in a Drama Program or Limited Series (Matysio), Best Supporting Actor in a Drama Program or Limited Series (Carver), Best Direction in a Drama Program or Limited Series (Filippo) and Best Writing in a Drama Program or Limited Series (Filippo)."Canadian Screen Awards: Anne with an E, Schitt's Creek lead contenders". CBC News, February 7, 2019. The second season premiered on CBC Gem in 2019."Preview: Save Me doles out excellent new episodes on CBC Gem". TV, eh?, June 26, 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 Canadian television series debuts Category:2017 web series debuts Category:Canadian comedy web series Category:Canadian drama web series Category:CBC Gem original programming
title: Save Me (web series)
